subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Harrington, 43, a three-time major winner ranked 297th entering the tournament, topped Berger, 21, on Monday on the second playoff hole at the P.G.A. National Champion course.
snippet: Harrington, 43, a three-time major winner ranked 297th entering the tournament, topped Berger, 21, on Monday on the second playoff hole at the P.G.A. National Champion course.
